movies.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
Ford v Ferrari
movies.description: American automotive designer Carroll Shelby and fearless British race car driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference, the laws of physics and their own personal demons to build a revolutionary vehicle for the Ford Motor Co. Together, they plan to compete against the race cars of Enzo Ferrari.

movies.title: The Terminator
movies.description: In 1984, a human soldier is tasked to stop an indestructible cyborg killing machine, both sent from 2029, from executing a young woman, whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation

movies.title: Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker
movies.description: The surviving Resistance faces the First Order once more in the final chapter of the Skywalker saga

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
movies.description: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
movies.description: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy the second Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap
